thread.title: THAI Receives “Best International Airline of theTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: THAI Receives “Best International Airline of theTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: THAI Receives “Best International Airline of theTravelandtourworld.com
text:
THAI Receives “Best International Airline of the Year 2015” from Today’s Traveller
Mr. Korakot Chatasingha (second from right), General Manager at Republic of India, Thai Airways International Public Company Limited (THAI), recently represented THAI and received the “Best International Airline of the Year 2015” Award at Today’s Traveller 9th Annual Awards ceremony from Mr. Mahesh Sharma (second from left), Minister of Tourism & Culture, India at the Taj Palace, New Delhi, Republic of India. Also present was Mrs. Kamal Gill (first from left), Executive Editor and Managing Director of Today’s Traveller, Mr. Kewal Gill (third from left), Founder of Gill India Concepts Pvt Ltd., Mr. Ravi Talwar (first from right), THAI Area Sales Manager in India.
Today’s Traveller Award was established in 2007 by Gill India Group, the leading travel magazine publisher in India, whereby this is the ninth year that the awards ceremony was held. Awards were granted based on excellence in the following categories: best luxury hotel, best travel agency, best inflight service, and best international airline of the year.
Source:- THAI Airways
